description:
Building tensions threaten to break up Team Balle du Soleil when Baku’s big secret is revealed. Tetsuya decides to take matters into his own hands and makes a performance out of his fight with Davide. Then Zanya faces off against Shido.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Tetsuya Koritsu Muen! Balle du Soleil Houkai!?
テツヤ孤立無援! バルソレイユ崩壊!?
